alert.note: Alert for Huron; Lorain (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 3:15PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Huron and southwestern Lorain Counties through 400 PM EDT... At 314 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Wakeman, or 8 miles east of Norwalk, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Grafton, Wellington, Wakeman, Oberlin, Lagrange, Penfield, Pittsfield, Kipton and Rochester. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for north central and northeastern Ohio.
